greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Greatest image of A001222 over the prime indices of n.
comment: For the initial term, we assume the empty set has maximum image 0.
A prime index of n is a number m such that prime(m) divides n. The multiset of prime indices of n is row n of A112798.
xref: Positions of first appearances are A033844.
The version for minimum is A340928.
A003963 multiplies together the prime indices.
A056239 adds up the prime indices.
A061395 selects the greatest prime index.
A072233 counts partitions by sum and maximum.
A112798 lists the prime indices of each positive integer.
A303975 counts distinct prime factors in the product of prime indices.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jan 28 2021
